can somebody help me?: windows no longer works on my system, and i would like to make ubuntu my only OS. however, i still have files on my harddrive (accessible through ubuntu) on windows that i want to transfer
is there a way to install ubuntu and transfer windows files from my hard drive?
yes , create an ext3 or 4 partition for ubuntu if you haven't already , then once ubuntu is installed , the file manager should see your windows partition
